message.body: I just sent you a Christmas list. I know it's late. I'm sorry. I can't think of things. So if you can't get anything, it's okay. That's my fault. And if you already got me something else, great.
Also sorry I never responded to your text about mom. Victor talked to you about the microwave?
Yea... Steph and I are contributing
Now i need bday idea lol
Did she tell you about the wedding rings or the money for the wolf trip?
Btw I didn't pass the vision exam today. My eyes without glasses are so bad they don't meet the requirements. So I can't be a police officer
Are you serious? Why would that matter?? You have contacts and glasses. These rules are stupid.
I'm really sorry to hear it :/
Im upset but nothing I can do about it
